title: Rav Dov Landau in Cleveland
body: Rav Dov Landau, Slabodka Rosh Yeshiva, visited Cleveland as part of the Keren Olam HaTorah trip, drawing thousands for a day of chizuk and Torah commitment. Rabbonim and community leaders joined to welcome him and support the Israeli Torah world.

title: Turx Defends Third Bais Hamikdosh
body: Rabbi Turx defends his question about building the Third Bais Hamikdosh in Yerushalayim, saying it's about strategy, not construction. Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt says the topic hasn't been discussed at the White House.
